about_the_game:
The Venture to the Vile Original Soundtrack debuts the work of David Wallace and Michael Kearney in their first video game original soundtrack. Featuring a mixture of lollipop nightmare and melancholy, this album captures the essence of Rainybrook's story and its quirky characters.

David Wallace has been playing music in Edinburgh and touring the UK for more than 20 years, and is part of "Glamour and the Baybes". Co-composer Michael Kerney is the frontman of "The Katet", and the two of them have been collaborating for over 15 years, making anything from jazz fusion, funk music to electronic. Their versatility can be experienced in the music of Venture to the Vile, going from unsettling, dramatic, to peaceful, nostalgic, and adorable.

Enjoy two hours of uncanny delight. Welcome to Rainybrook!
